TopicTitle: Migrating space planes to the rocket hangar

Articles.Content: I want to create space planes in their hangar and then load them in the rocket hangar.
Currently this isn\'t supported, but it\'s a planned feature, possibly for 0.16?
Not supported ingame, but it\'s extremely easy to do yourself. Copy the craft file from the SPH folder, paste into the VAB folder. Done.

> 
> Not supported ingame, but it\'s extremely easy to do yourself. Copy the craft file from the SPH folder, paste into the VAB folder. Done.

When I try this the game crashes. Im trying to attach a space plane to some rockets to get it out of orbit. It\'s kind of hard to do when taking off from a run way with engines that don\'t work in the upper atmosphere. 

\*Update\* After a couple of attempts I got this to work. Clicking the cockpit adjusts the ship to an upright position.

If you want to launch your ship in another direction than the default one, simply select the whole ship (command pod or shift+click) and rotate it as a single part.

I tried launching a plane on its tail, but it broke apart... good luck with this though =P
